author: Steven R Galster
title: The wildlife trade caused coronavirus, and a vaccine can't fix it
description: The multibillion-dollar wildlife trade must be brought to an end if we want to avoid more pandemics in the future.
content:
US National Health Advisor Dr Anthony Fauci and Senator Lindsey Graham this week fingered wildlife "wet" markets as the source of COVID-19.
With Americans focused on the country's rising number of coronavirus cases, Fauci and Graham represent the first high-… [+5496 chars]
